stimulusHtml: Which of the following is a feature of Maya Lin’s Vietnam Veterans Memorial that constitutes its primary departure from traditional war memorials?

features.html: The question refers to the images shown.

choicesHtml: The use of black granite rather than the more common polished bronze
The link to environmentalism implied by its designation as an earthwork
The omission of introductory texts and dates related to the war
The nonfigurative composition made up of engraved names
